      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Action Reasoning.mostLikelyAction(java.util.List<Case> nn)
      takes a list of Actions and returns the most likely one
      abstract Action Agent.run(Input i)
      returns the action that it thinks its the best for a given input, of course, using the reasoner assigned to the agent.
      Action Reasoning.selectAction(Input i)
      selects an action, using the retrival it has, of a given input.

    • Uses of Action in org.jLOAF.action

      Subclasses of Action in org.jLOAF.action 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AtomicAction
      an Atomic Action is the Atomic level of an Action, it can only take one feature, and has a name, usually the name represents the action itself.
      class  ComplexAction
      a Complex Action is a higher level of the action class, it has a list of Action, which they could be either atomic or complexAction.
      Methods in org.jLOAF.action that return Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Action ComplexAction.get(java.lang.String name)
      returns the name of the action
      Methods in org.jLOAF.action with parameters of type Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ComplexAction.add(Action a)
      adds an action, that is either complex or atomic, to the collection of action that this action has
      double ComplexAction.similarity(Action action)
      goes through the list of actions that it has, and it compares them using their own similarities.
      double AtomicAction.similarity(Action action)
      returns the similarity between two actions, by first using the similarity method of the parent class,then if the names were the same, it checks their features.
      double Action.similarity(Action action)
      calculates the similarity between two actions,by comparing their names.

      Returns the most likely action
      Action NeuralNetworkReasoner.selectAction(Input i)
      This method takes an input, converts it into a list and passes it to NeuralNetworkRemote to get the most likely action.

      This method takes an input, converts it into a list and passes it to NeuralNetworkRemote to get the most likely action.
      Action KDReasoning.selectAction(Input i) 
      Action DynamicBayesianReasoner.selectAction(Input i)
      This method takes and input, sets the inputs in the correct index based on the indices of the feature names, and then depending on the timesetep will get the intiialState or newState, add it onto the list of inputs and pass it on to the getAction function.
      Action BayesianReasoner.selectAction(Input i)
      This function initially trains the agent when called the first time.
